entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Morris
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:44 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Emerson 12:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -23.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -39
Dewpoint: -26.3°C
Wind: NNW 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 31 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022
